Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
The Smart mirror skill will be used to operate the mirror light, including dimmable,color change,night light

Here's a step by step guide:
(1). Search the Alexa Skills directory for "HOMEWERKS Smart Mirror";
(2). Click Enable skill of "HOMEWERKS Smart Mirror", then input your account username, password on the Account Linking page. You can register the account on Account Linking page or companion app;
(3). Talk to Echo “Alexa, discover devices.”. Wait till Echo says "Discover is completed";
(4). Now all setup is done. Try talk to Echo to control your devices.

For Example:

* Alexa, turn on bathroom light
* Alexa, turn off bathroom light
* Alexa, dim bathroom light
* Alexa, brighten bathroom light
* Alexa, set bathroom light to 20 percent
